definitions.definition: A measure of the extent of a surface; it is measured in square units.
Any particular extent of surface, especially an empty or unused extent.
definitions.example: The photo is a little dark in that area.

definitions.definition: The extent, scope, or range of an object or concept.
definitions.example: The plans are a bit vague in that area.

definitions.definition: An open space, below ground level, between the front of a house and the pavement.
